game.name: Legendary Tales V: Price of Power Collector's Edition
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 잊힌 땅과 고대의 마법은 마녀들의 압제에 맞선 위험한 여정을 불러온다. "Legendary Tales V: 힘의 대가 "은 수많은 미니 게임과 퍼즐, 잊을 수 없는 인물, 복잡한 퀘스트가 포함된 숨겨진 개체 장르의 어드벤처 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Forgotten lands and ancient magic give rise to a dangerous journey against the oppressive rule of witches. “Legendary Tales V. Price of Power” is an adventure game in the Hidden Objects genre, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters, and complicated quests.
